segments.text: I'm checking out now . Can I have my bill , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . What's your room number , sir ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's 876 . Here is my key card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A minute , please . It's 6215 yuan all together , tax included .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I pay with traveler's check ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Can I have your passport , please ?
segments.speaker: S2
